content: > click here 1 to get this pattern for free on my blog the solid granny square is perhaps the most versatile granny square because it does not have as many holes as other granny squares you can use it to make sturdy projects such as bags and coasters this pattern is in english and uses us terminology skill level beginner materials needed worsted weight cotton yarn us e/5 3 5mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors measurement 4 25″ x 4 25″ 10 8 cm x 10 8 cm this pattern is for personal use only please do not claim this pattern as your own sell or distribute it you may sell finished products made using this pattern in small quantities 1 https //ribblr com/pattern/solid-granny-square-coaster-crochet-pattern-crochet referrer=300541
